Chapter 2 Using loops to calculate sums and sums of squares 2.1 Printing values

Chapter 2 Using loops to calculate sums and sums of squares We often use loops to go over series of values and perform operations on them. While more advanced R users typically use techniques such as vectorization, or functions such as lapply(), using basic for loops is often the best thing to use when going over a series of values.
